Boston Scientific Top Loading Programmer Bag

The Boston Scientific Top Loading programmer bag is designed to hold your Zoom programmer, documents, accessories, and cables. The bag is foam padded with rigid plastic supports to protect your programmer from damage. The two large outer pockets are perfect for everything else you need to carry with your programmer. The bag is water resistant and made of the best materials available.

CUSTOM BAG FEATURES:

  • Boston Scientific (or any other) Company Logo
  • You can add your name or any other text to the bag
  • Telescoping pull handle
  • Our Watts Bags exclusive wheel system
  • Plastic guards to prevent handle from denting
  • Commercial grade buckles, handles, fabrics, and zippers
  • 2 Large outer pouch pockets for all of your accessories

  • Learn more about bag features

Boston Scientific Top Loading Bag$240

  • Rigid Weight: 10.2 lbs
  • Lightened Weight: 9.2 lbs
  • External Dimensions: 24.5" Deep x 16" Wide x 10.5"
    • Long  Internal Dimensions: 19.5" Deep x 15" Wide x 5.5" Long
